edu.cmu.cs.ark.yc.utils

Class MathMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.cs.ark.yc.utils.MathMethods

  • public abstract class MathMethods
extends Object
    This class contains useful Math-related utilities that are not found in Apache Commons Math 3.0.
    Version:
    0.1, 04/02/2012
    Author:
    Yanchuan Sim

        log_a - log a
        log_b - log b
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • safeMultiply

        public static double safeMultiply(double a,
                  double b)
        Multiply two numbers safely, i.e when one of them is 0, the result is always 0.
        Parameters:
        a - Multiplier.
        b - Multiplicator.
        Returns:
        a * b
